channel.title: RsSkills V2 - Remake with a difference
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2wqsifd.png[/img][/center] [size=2][b]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] Welcome to the RsSkills server development team thread. This remake is based on a Pi server which i have cleaned to the bone, Removed all un-needed code and improved the stability greatly. [size=2][b]2.0 - About us[/b][/size] The reason i started this remake is because my server was too easy. people could level much to quickly and it wasn't a challenge. So i decided to create a remake which had a better economy, this way people would play the server for longer and generally enjoy the game much more. I aim to keep the general system the same such as all skills working but have more features. [size=2][b]3.0 - Changelog[/b][/size]
[b]18 December 2011:[/b] Improved Runecrafting [b]16 December 2011:[/b] Added Runecrafting base [b]15 December 2011:[/b] Started a Prayer Base Cleared out unneeded code from PI server.
[size=2][b]3.5 - Status.[/b][/size] [center] [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091215022527/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img][size=19pt]PRAYER[/size][img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091215022527/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img] all p2p bones working - 50% all f2p bones working - 100% bonecrusher - 0% [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042949/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img][size=19pt]RUNECRAFTING[/size][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042949/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img] F2P altars - 90% Entering & Exiting Altars - 50% Talisman Locating - 70% multiple runes - 0% [/center] [size=2][b]4.0 - Donation handling[/b][/size] All of the donations that are sent will be put towards the upkeep of the server. Donators will recieve access to a unique donator zone which will have ways of making skilling much faster but not too fats that it ruins the fun, There will be banks closer and a few shops. Although i won't let any of this ruin the economy and/or cause non donators to feel left out. [size=2][b]5.0 - The Applications.[/b][/size] [b]Please Note:[/b] If applying you agree that you may be required to do anything i ask of you. This can include coding new packages to simply updating a new npc spawns.
Name: Msn: Skype: Java experience: Proof:
Name: Msn: Skype: Java experience: Proof:
Name: Msn: Skype: Programs Used: Proof:
Name: Msn: Skype: HTML, CSS, PHP & Javascript experience: Proof:
[size=2][b]6.0 - Staff List[/b][/size] Server Coders: [b]3/3[/b] [img]http://rsskills.co.uk/v2/www.runescape.com/forum/crown_gold.gif[/img][b]Mod Tommo[/b] (Myself) [img]http://rsskills.co.uk/v2/www.runescape.com/forum/crown_gold.gif[/img][b]Mod Lexi[/b] [img]http://rsskills.co.uk/v2/www.runescape.com/forum/crown_gold.gif[/img][b]Mod Nox[/b] (Neroxx) Client Coders: [b]1/2[/b] [img]http://rsskills.co.uk/v2/www.runescape.com/forum/crown_gold.gif[/img][b]Mod Daginith[/b] (Daginith) [img]http://rsskills.co.uk/v2/www.runescape.com/forum/crown_gold.gif[/img][b]N/A[/b] Forum/Website Developers: [b]1/2[/b] [img]http://rsskills.co.uk/v2/www.runescape.com/forum/crown_green.gif[/img][b]Mod Mike[/b] (spidermat1) [img]http://rsskills.co.uk/v2/www.runescape.com/forum/crown_green.gif[/img][b]N/A[/b] Graphic Designers: [b]0/1[/b] N/A [size=2][b]7.0 - Credits[/b][/size] [b]Tyb97:[/b] Helping me with my runecrafting class.

item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:23, topic:425495”]Spot: Client Programmer
Name: Daginith
Msn: daginith@gmail.com
Java experience: 2+ years
Proof: ive been working on MANY rsps for quite a while. i’ll find links for you if u want them, i just dont want to waste my time finding them if they wont be needed :p[/quote]

I shall give you a go and see how it goes.

[quote=“spidermat1, post:24, topic:425495”]Name:Mike
Msn:headshotbro@hotmail.com
Skype:secret.newb.soft
HTML, CSS, PHP & Javascript experience:I Been coding in HTML for 2 years and im kinda new to php,javascript but im learning
Proof:http://immortalrs.com/[/quote]

Many developments just accept people that don’t do anything and end up damaging the development as a whole.

Maybe even provide task examples, so for example creating a voting system and so on.[/quote]

I Dislike ircs and find Msn and skype eaiser, Mostly skype for its VoIP but yeah, I am at work so i just bodged together this development thread, i am going to improve it when i get home

item.title: RsSkills V2 - Remake with a difference
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

[center][/center]

[size=2]1.0 - Introduction[/size]
Welcome to the RsSkills server development team thread. This remake is based on a Pi server which i have cleaned to the bone, Removed all un-needed code and improved the stability greatly.

[size=2]2.0 - About us[/size]
The reason i started this remake is because my server was too easy. people could level much to quickly and it wasn’t a challenge. So i decided to create a remake which had a better economy, this way people would play the server for longer and generally enjoy the game much more. I aim to keep the general system the same such as all skills working but have more features.

[size=2]3.0 - Changelog[/size]

[b]18 December 2011:[/b] Improved Runecrafting [b]16 December 2011:[/b] Added Runecrafting base [b]15 December 2011:[/b] Started a Prayer Base Cleared out unneeded code from PI server.
[size=2][b]3.5 - Status.[/b][/size] [center] [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091215022527/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img][size=19pt]PRAYER[/size][img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091215022527/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img] all p2p bones working - 50% all f2p bones working - 100% bonecrusher - 0%

[size=19pt]RUNECRAFTING[/size]
F2P altars - 90%
Entering & Exiting Altars - 50%
Talisman Locating - 70%
multiple runes - 0%
[/center]

[size=2]4.0 - Donation handling[/size]
All of the donations that are sent will be put towards the upkeep of the server. Donators will recieve access to a unique donator zone which will have ways of making skilling much faster but not too fats that it ruins the fun, There will be banks closer and a few shops. Although i won’t let any of this ruin the economy and/or cause non donators to feel left out.

[size=2]5.0 - The Applications.[/size]
Please Note: If applying you agree that you may be required to do anything i ask of you. This can include coding new packages to simply updating a new npc spawns.

Name: Msn: Skype: Java experience: Proof:
Name: Msn: Skype: Java experience: Proof:
Name: Msn: Skype: Programs Used: Proof:
Name: Msn: Skype: HTML, CSS, PHP & Javascript experience: Proof:
[size=2][b]6.0 - Staff List[/b][/size]

Server Coders: 3/3
Mod Tommo (Myself)
Mod Lexi
Mod Nox (Neroxx)

Client Coders: 1/2
Mod Daginith (Daginith)
N/A

Forum/Website Developers: 1/2
Mod Mike (spidermat1)
N/A

Graphic Designers: 0/1
N/A

[size=2]7.0 - Credits[/size]
Tyb97: Helping me with my runecrafting class.

Read full topic
